column5: Description

column2: The GhostBeaters (Not Actually Affiliated With the RYM List But Rather Serverwide) 2017 Crimbus Stranglefuck Extravaganza II: Electric Boogaloo
column5:
The GhostBeaters Discord has decided to start fucking watching movies, and they're starting by watching 31 films throughout the month of December. 

Oh, here's the link if you want to join (it's a multimedia server where you can talk about film, games, music, whatever you want. There's also a metric FUCKTON of shitposting.):
https://discord.gg/BQzKnkn
